pageContext.claim: “China, which is a great economic power, is considered a Developing Nation within the World Trade Organization. They therefore get tremendous perks and advantages, especially over the U.S. Does anybody think this is fair. We were badly represented. The WTO is unfair to U.S.”
pageContext.analysis: Although it has become an economic powerhouse, China is not classified as a developed nation because wages and GDP per-capita remain relatively low.
